I've read the spec and created the implementation plan. Here's a summary:

## Implementation Plan Created

**Issue:** The first name field has a User icon prefix, but the last name field has no icon, creating visual inconsistency.

### Phase 1: Fix Icon Consistency
| Subtask | Description | File | Status |
|---------|-------------|------|--------|
| 1.1 | Add User icon to last name field | `frontend/src/components/auth/register-form.tsx` | pending |

### Phase 2: Verification
| Subtask | Description | Status |
|---------|-------------|--------|
| 2.1 | Run TypeScript type check | pending |
| 2.2 | Run linter | pending |

### Technical Details
The fix involves updating lines 88-98 in `register-form.tsx`:
- Wrap the last name `<Input>` in a `<div className="relative">` 
- Add `<User className="absolute left-3 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 w-5 h-5 text-muted-foreground" />` inside the wrapper
- Add `className="pl-10"` to the Input for proper icon spacing

**Estimated effort:** ~10 minutes  
**Risk level:** Low (the `User` icon is already imported; we're just applying an existing pattern)

The implementation plan has been saved to `./.auto-claude/specs/010-fix-inconsistent-icon-placement-in-register-form-n/implementation_plan.json`.
